sections.heading: 01|Public utilities definitions
sections.text: Effective:August 14, 2025Latest Legislation:House Bill 15 - 136th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFAs used in this chapter:(A) "Public utility" means each person referred to as a telephone company, telegraph company, electric company, natural gas company,

sections.heading: the Revised Code do not apply to either of the following:(A) Nonprofit corporations as defined in division (C) of section1702
sections.text: 01of the Revised Code that are engaged exclusively in the treatment, distribution, and sale of water to consumers;(B) Municipal corporations within this state.
